name: Origin Unicode Graph Template
summary: Learn about .OTPU files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: OTPU files replaced .OTP files, which were used to save graph templates in Origin before the release of Origin 2018. OTPU files are saved in a unicode format which features performance advantages over the older OTP file format.
You can only open OTPU files with Origin, which can be used to create, open, and edit OTPU files. The program is only available for Windows.
To open an OTPU file in Origin, select File â†’ Open..., select the "Origin Template .otpu" file type, navigate to the OTPU file location, and click Open.
